about_the_game:
"The Leopard Catgirl in Miaoli -Original Sound Track-" is Erotes Studio's Original Sound Track. The album contains 4 Songs and 9 Background music.

1.Way to home
2.A Beautiful Mind
3.500 Days of Miaoli
4.Sleepless in Miaoli
5.While You Were Sleeping
6.The Bridges of Miaoli City
7.Un Coeur en Hiver
8.Enemy of the Miaoli
9.Primal Fear
10.Sunny Day Wishes
11.Sunny Day Wishes Instrumental
12.I Hate You
13.I Hate You Instrumental
